For anyone having problems replacing Ashbase.dll, install avast, reboot in safe mode, replace the DLL and reboot and your good!
thanks works like a charm..

how to patch the easy way
1.Install in trial mode and Reboot (a reboot is a must!)
2. in Settings->troubleshooting disable Avast self-defense module
3. win->Run (or use win key + R button for the Run box) type; "services.msc" stop both avast services (avast antivirus and avast firewall)
4. using task manager ctrl+alt+del kill the AvastUI.exe process
5. Replace the dll (I recommend renaming the original dll to AshBase-Orig.dll) copy the patched AshBase.dll to avast install folder
6. using the service manager (see #3) start the avast services (both of them), now start the AvastUI using the Desktop or Start Meny icon

That's it no need for safe mode or a reboot. Tanks for the upload
